akn:section.akn:heading: Special aviation incentive pay and bonus authorities for officers

akn:content.akn:p: (b) The Secretary concerned may pay an aviation bonus under this section to an officer in a regular or reserve component of a uniformed service who—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Maximum Amount and Method of Payment.—

akn:content.akn:p: (d) To receive an aviation officer bonus under this section, an officer determined to be eligible for the bonus shall enter into a written agreement with the Secretary concerned that specifies—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Reserve Component Officers Performing Inactive Duty Training.—

akn:content.akn:p: (e) A reserve component officer who is entitled to compensation under section 206 of this title and who is authorized aviation incentive pay under this section may be paid an amount of incentive pay that is proportionate to the compensation received under section 206 for inactive-duty training.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Relationship to Other Pay and Allowances.—

akn:content.akn:p: (g) An officer who receives aviation incentive pay or an aviation bonus under this section and who fails to fulfill the eligibility requirements for the receipt of the incentive pay or bonus or complete the period of service for which the incentive pay or bonus is paid, as specified in the written agreement under subsection (d) in the case of a bonus, shall be subject to the repayment provisions of section 373 of this title.
(i) No agreement may be entered into under this section after December 31, 2025.
